subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti claimed the pole position for today’s Firestone Indy 400 at Brooklyn, Mich. The reigning Indianapolis 500 champion, he will be joined on the front row by Sam Hornish.Franchitti is heading into the race with a 24-point lead over Scott Dixon, who is going for his fourth straight victory. Dixon will start seventh in the 20-car field.
